Rah and you stay inside. You two don't want to get involved in anythign crazy, and besides, someone needs to watch the radio. BANG! Another firework explodes, and you and Rah's energy falls another notch. You hit eachother to keep yourselves awake. Bang! You two yawn. Bang. Bang. Bang... ba... ng... Eventually, you and Rah can't fight it, and the both of you fall asleep.
